summary:
Senior Project Manager with 25 years IT and project management experience as Subject Matter Expert (SME) and as a Project Manager in international environments. Worked as IBM Technical SME at Fluor BV and IBM Lead Technical PM at Tata Steel. Project assignments in Europe, India, Singapore en South-Africa. Worked as a Project Manager at Centralpoint B.V.
Currently working as IT Operations Specialist for the Benelux at Fluor B.V. in Hoofddorp.

References available from IBM, Fluor, Tata Steel UK, CAP Gemini UK and Centralpoint.

Key words or phrases: project management, project management office, agile, analytic, high level, international, customer focus, technical, focal point, leadership, team player, self supporting, mid-market.

projects.title: Knowledge Transfer Wintel
projects.description:
Responsible for writing the implementation plan for the knowledge transfer from Wintel India Bangalore team to Noida team, including Lift & Shift of work from Wintel NL to Wintel India Noida. 
2 week visit to Noida team for on site training and get to know the team.
Coordinating the aftercare: plan extra knowledge transfer sessions, collecting and writing knowledge documents, upgrading internal knowledge bases / web sites,

projects.title: Move of the IT department
projects.description:
Role: Lead technical project manager	Omron Europe BV
Tasks:	
•	Designed the new office environment of the IT department and the data center in the main building
•	Planned and coordinated the move
•	Worked close together with Facility Management, internal and external support groups, suppliers and department management
•	Setup of the cable scheme, server racks, detailed planning, check lists, processes, work instructions, risk analysis, blue print of the office floor, application landscape
•	Participated in all meetings and the actual move
Results: Complete set of documents, overviews and instructions; within 48 hours the office and data center were operational again

courses.name: Planning, maintaining and implementing Windows 2003 Server Active Directory

profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Mgr Managed Services & Logistieke IT projecten

profile_positions.description:
Tasks: As part of the Tata Steel Transformation project: moving a data center in the UK;
          •	Working together with the IBM architect on the high level and detailed planning and activities of the DC move from UK to NL. 
          •	Completed a two day agile workshop in Rotherham with all participants (customer representatives, service providers etc.) to determine the application landscape and technical details and dependencies around the whole move.
          •	Performed a leading role in the technical workshops.
          •	Knowledge transfer to local colleagues with regard to performing a data center move
Results: High level plan, server scope list, application landscape template, detailed description of the different move options.

Role: Lead SME 
Tasks: As part of the Tata Steel Transformation project: knowledge transfer;
•	Setup of a skill matrix per team, analysed the outcome and reported back to project management
•	Setup of the knowledge transfer plan
Results: High level knowledge transfer plan, skill matrix, skill silo’s

Role: Lead SME 
Tasks	As part of the Tata Steel Transition project: customer environment analysis;
•	Interviews and get acquainted with all the engineers of the Wintel department in NL and UK on location.
•	Gathered information with regard to (daily) tasks, responsibilities, projects, processes and procedures within the department
Results: Job role description of the Wintel engineers
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Tasks:
•	Deployed a set of default scripts according to a scrum method on all customer environments in the Benelux
•	Developed and maintained an overall status and planning document
•	Coordinated and planned tasks with the SME’s involved
•	Setup management reports
•	Working close together with the SME’s, the implementation team, project/service/change management and department management
•	Participated in (executive) management and technical meetins
Results: Status and planning overviews, active set of scripts per customer
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Tasks:
•	Restructured and rebuild local data centers of Fluor offices in the Netherlands and Belgium
•	Created all plans, participated in all activities
•	Worked close together with the customer, local support engineers, support groups and service management
•	Documented all changes and new lay-outs
Results: Up to date data centers, server rack drawings and patch overviews, new internal cabling
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Tasks: As part of the overall Fluor office move: move of the data center
•	Coordinated and delegated tasks and responsibilities to internal and external support groups
•	Setup of server rack overviews, plans and planning, check lists, processes, work instructions, patch plan, color and number scheme’s, risk analysis, support group overviews and application landscape.
•	Participated in development of MER's and SER's
•	Participated in all management and technical meetings and the actual move
Results: Complete set of documents, tempates, overviews and instructions; within 24 hours the data center was operational again
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working together with Wintel Focal Points on Knowledge Transfer to Wintel colleagues in India.
Acting as backup LSE for Omron. Also, Wintel support engineer for Fluor in Haarlem
profile_positions.title: Lead SME

profile_positions.description:
Working in the Wintel team as Lead System Engineer (focal point) for the NXP account as first point of contact for technical issues and customer specific issues; working closely together with project and service management; managing a windows server (w2k3 &  w2k8) environment together with other international support groups; act as team lead for Dutch Wintel colleagues.
Coordinated the phase out of NXP as customer (end of contract), went to Singapore and Belgium datacenter for consolidating servers and services.
Still acting as backup LSE for Omron. Also, Wintel support engineer for Fluor.
profile_positions.title: Lead SME

profile_positions.description:
Working in the Wintel team for the Omron account. 
Since March 2009 started as Lead System Engineer (focal point) for the Omron account as first point of contact for technical issues and customer specific issues; participated in migration and centralization projects; managed a centralized windows server (w2k3 & w2k8) environment; acted as team lead for Dutch Wintel colleagues.
profile_positions.title: Lead SME

profile_positions.description:
•	2005-2007: Technical Support Engineer: 2nd line support for hardware, software, telephony and network in a NT4+W2K+W2K3 and VMWare environment on IBM xSeries servers; co-project leader for implementing a new door entry system for the main office.
•	2005-2006: project leader for setting up a local IT support team at Omron Healthcare Europe BV.
•	2004-2005: project leader for the total move of the complete Omron IT department (incl. the design and the build of the computer rooms, the design of the lay-out of the department, the move).
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Engineer

profile_positions.description: Teamleader European Service Desk; setting up a new Service Desk with an incident registration system, procedures, processes, standards and SLA’s; implement a new incident registration system; hire new employees; part of European project for deploying new standard servers; co-project leader for reorganising the computer room; developing and deploying an IT Knowledge Database and Personal Skill List.
profile_positions.title: Service Desk Team Leader

profile_positions.description: 1999-2000: gedetacheerd bij de European IT afdeling van het deurwaarderskantoor Intrum Justitia te Amsterdam: als Service Desk teamleider verantwoorlijk voor de goede afhandeling 1e en 2e lijns hardware en software incidenten; opstellen van rapportages m.b.t. de incident registratie; direct rapporteren aan de European IT Manager; inrichten van een nieuw kantoor in Mannheim met nieuwe pc’s en server.
profile_positions.title: Service Desk Team Leader

profile_positions.description: Na de verhuizing van de Help Desk naar Rotterdam werkzaam in het 2e lijns technisch support team, voornamenlijk software ondersteuning.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Specialist

profile_positions.description: 1996-1999: gedetacheerd bij Moret, Ernst & Young in Den Haag en Rotterdam: Help Desk mederwerker van het eerste uur tijdens de migratie van Apple naar Windows; betrokken bij het opzetten van de Nederlandse Help Desk en de support structuur;
profile_positions.title: Service Desk Team member
